item.title: Chocolatey GUI 0.16.0
item.description:
Version 0.16.0 of Chocolatey GUI has been released.

Contributions were included from:

Full details of everything that was included in this release can be seen below.
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
Version 0.16.0 of Chocolatey GUI has been released.

Contributions were included from:

  • mwallner
  • gep13
  • AdmiringWorm
  • RichiCoder1
  • ferventcoder
  • magol
  • CSJedi
  • punker76
  • DamianMaslanka5

Full details of everything that was included in this release can be seen below.

Issues

As part of this release we had 26 issues closed.

Feature

  • #527 Search only on enter / with delay.
  • #517 Create a tile view for local/remote package views.

Improvement

  • #523 Add missing translations.
  • #512 Autofocus search boxes on SourceViews.
  • #492 Switch markdown rendering to Markdig.Wpf.
  • #490 Drop support for SVG Icons.
  • #395 Globalisation - Dutch.

Documentation

  • #542 Globalisation - Portuguese.
  • #538 Globalisation - Spanish.
  • #537 Globalisation - Russian.
  • #536 Globalisation - Japanese.
  • #535 Globalisation - French.
  • #508 Add russian localization.
  • #504 Update Swedish translation.
  • #489 Added missing translated strings for Norwegian Bokmål.
  • #487 make tooltips localizable and add german translation.
  • #416 Add tooling for localization (automatic 'missing string' detection).

Bug

  • #534 Creates two directories under ProgramData.
  • #524 Remember tile/list view preferences.
  • #509 Fix overlay - Title should overlap download section, not the other way around.
  • #499 Release notes in about dialog empty.
  • #269 sort sequence of name column.

Build

  • #529 Use Cake.Chocolatey.Module to install transifex.
  • #498 (build) Fix sign criteria for null paths.
  • #496 Update build for authenticode signing.
  • #495 Update package for new Chocolatey requirements.

Where to get it

You can download this release from chocolatey

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.

item.title: Chocolatey GUI 0.15.0
item.description:
Version 0.15.0 of Chocolatey GUI has been released.

Contributions were included from:

Full details of everything that was included in this release can be seen below.
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
Version 0.15.0 of Chocolatey GUI has been released.

Contributions were included from:

  • RichiCoder1
  • pascalberger
  • gep13
  • mwallner
  • AdmiringWorm
  • magol
  • cniweb
  • ferventcoder
  • Magnus Österlund
  • punker76

Full details of everything that was included in this release can be seen below.

Issues

As part of this release we had 115 issues closed.

Feature

  • #473 Self Service within ChocolateyGUI.
  • #451 (GH-371) Enable self-service mode.
  • #382 Add check for background service.
  • #371 Add check for useBackgroundService .
  • #295 Missing Code Signature.
  • #275 Chocolatey GUI doesn't save user's preferred window position, size and state.
  • #246 Allow config editing.
  • #119 Support file system sources.
  • #115 Provide ability to update Chocolatey.
  • #62 Add posibility to have personal sources.
  • #61 show list of installed packages for that packagename.

Improvement

  • #484 Match Gallery Styles.
  • #482 (GH-452) Support SxS Packages.
  • #471 Fixes in German translation.
  • #465 Use highestAvailable instead of subprocess.
  • #464 Provide ability to set Admin Only flag for source.
  • #453 Please run processes on another thread.
  • #439 Package refresh should be automatic and hidden.
  • #425 Add additional properties to Sources Tab in Settings screen.
  • #414 update to chocolatey 0.10.4.
  • #404 Globalization - Norwegian Bokmål.
  • #399 The "title" of the UI is often wrong or non-sensical.
  • #359 Order sources by priority and state.
  • #355 Link not parsed in Release Notes.
  • #330 Update all button hard to find.
  • #329 Can't control main window while actions are in progress.
  • #323 Update dependencies in Chocolatey GUI Wix Script.
  • #308 (GH-288) Filter packages list after refreshing or updating all packages.
  • #298 (GH-288) Improved GUI behavior after "update all".
  • #292 Scroll to top of packages list when going to a new page.
  • #286 (GH-285) Add Control Margins.
  • #285 Add UI padding.
  • #267 Intergrate with Chocolatey API.
  • #265 Cannot search for packages AND only show those with updates.
  • #253 Use the global config sources.
  • #202 Support for SVG package icons.

Documentation

  • #478 German texts in settings page are to long.
  • #467 Update swedish localization.
  • #444 (GH-443) Fix inconsistencies in German translation.
  • #443 Fix inconsistencies in German translation.
  • #427 More explicitly call out OS support.
  • #413 Add/Update missing German translation.
  • #412 (GH-396) Added Swedish translation.
  • #410 Localization/missing translations.
  • #408 (GH-404) Added Norwegian Bokmål translation.
  • #406 (GH-405) Moved hard coded text strings to resource file.
  • #403 Fix typo.
  • #402 ChocolateyGUI, Chocolatey GUI, Chocolatey Gui, or something else.
  • #397 Chocolatey GUI Globalisation HowTo.
  • #394 Added Gitter and GitHub links.
  • #373 Generate Documentation/Blog using Wyam.
  • #315 Update Screenshot in README.
  • #314 Update Credits.
  • #311 Update chocolatey's icon.
  • #280 About > Making a chocolatey package for Chocolatey GUI > 404 not found.

Bug

  • #480 Incorrect option in Package Details view.
  • #470 Seemingly Random Chocolatey GUI Crash.
  • #469 Issue Launching with Chocolatey Licensed.
  • #463 List of packages needing updates is truncated randomly.
  • #462 Updating a package doesn't honour "Show Only Packages with Updates" when list is refreshed.
  • #460 Access Denied on Launch.
  • #458 ChocoGUI Crash on Startup -- Windows 10.
  • #455 Source Configuration - Seeing and Setting Bypass Proxy and Allow Self-Service on a Source doesn't work.
  • #452 Support displaying multiple versions of locally installed packages.
  • #450 Chocolatey GUI crashes when started from another working-directory.
  • #449 Chocolatey GUI crashes when closed while still loading packages.
  • #448 Random Chocolatey GUI crash.
  • #447 FileLoadException on launch.
  • #446 (GH-445) Fix outdated check.
  • #445 Chocolatey GUI doesn't display VersionInfo from internal feeds.
  • #440 NullRefEx on launch.
  • #436 Remove the Hacks where you access Chocolatey's SimpleInjector.Container.
  • #434 Remove AlphaFS dependency.
  • #424 Selecting multiple packages with CTRL key to update results in only the first package being updated.
  • #421 After selecting single package to update upon update completion the UI list of packages remains blank does not refresh.
  • #411 Pressing setting multiple times make it impossible to go back.
  • #405 Text/Header strings not prepared to be translated.
  • #380 Dates are displayed in US format not in machine locale format.
  • #372 Chocolatey GUI errors on subprocess when attempting to open more than one instance of Chocolatey GUI.
  • #370 Duplicated entries.
  • #368 Win7 Powershell5 update.
  • #360 Error starting v0.14.0-unstable0147.
  • #358 Option for hiding disabled package sources.
  • #357 NullReferenceException opening settings while packages are loading.
  • #353 Errors on console updating package.
  • #352 NullReferenceException on closing settings.
  • #333 Chocoatey-View (not This PC): sorting list by downloads causes crash.
  • #332 Win32Exception upon clicking the "Install GoogleChrome instead" link in "Google Chrome (64-bit only)" detail page.
  • #331 missing packages in Chocolatey GUI.
  • #327 System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.
  • #319 Crash using 'Update all'.
  • #309 Looses filter on refresh.
  • #307 Installed Packages Not Properly Handled.
  • #301 Erroneous date format.
  • #297 Runtime error.
  • #288 Shows all packages although "Show Only Packages with Updates" is ticked after "update all".
  • #266 Chocolatey GUI stuck on "Retrieving installed packages".
  • #264 Refreshing package list ignores search query/options.
  • #263 Settings flyout showing twice.
  • #256 PSSecurityException.
  • #225 Error messages.
  • #124 Problem with opening Sources setting page.

Internal Refactoring

  • #393 Remove hard coded path to ruleset file.
  • #392 Prevent execution of GitLink.
  • #391 Correct AppVeyor Skip Regular Expression.
  • #390 Make tools folder invalidation dependent on setup.cake.
  • #389 Remove Gitter Configuration from yml file.
  • #388 Change name of appveyor file.
  • #387 Remove unnecessary Wyam variables.
  • #82 Update Build Script to include running of Unit Tests.

:Infastructure

  • #349 Prepare 0.15 Release.

Build

  • #341 Switch Build Infrastructure to Cake.
  • #317 0.9.10 and exit codes.
  • #310 Update and remove unused dependencies.
  • #209 Review MSI package.

Where to get it

You can download this release from chocolatey

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.

item.author: gep13

item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
This release includes the following:

Improvements

  • #220 Make all Write-Host's Write-Output's
  • #218 Enhance default.ps1 to install latest Chocolatey on Build Worker
  • #217 Create another MyGet Feed for packages pushed from AppVeyor Master Branch

Bug

item.title: Chocolatey GUI 0.12.0
item.description: This release is a complete re-architecture of Chocolatey GUI, switching from a Windows Forms Application to a WPF Application. All credit goes to Richard Simpson for the amazing amount of work put into this. In addition, we have added a more stringent build process, making use of tools like FxCop, StyleCop, DupFinder and InspectCode, as well as Continuous Integration services like AppVeyor and TeamCity CodeBetter.
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
This release is a complete re-architecture of Chocolatey GUI, switching from a Windows Forms Application to a WPF Application. All credit goes to Richard Simpson for the amazing amount of work put into this. In addition, we have added a more stringent build process, making use of tools like FxCop, StyleCop, DupFinder and InspectCode, as well as Continuous Integration services like AppVeyor and TeamCity CodeBetter.

Features

  • #189 Administrator Issues
  • #185 Right click context menu for packages should show "Details"
  • #177 A feature under the menu strip to be able to refresh package lists.
  • #163 Add EditorConfig File
  • #125 [Feature] Add Raygun.io to application
  • #122 Should be able to cancel Update All
  • #121 Change "Updating all packages."
  • #118 Add Maintainers to Package View
  • #114 [Suggestion] Provide context menu for common actions
  • #113 [Suggestion] Ability to do update all
  • #112 [Suggestion] Provide additional information in Local Grid
  • #111 [Suggestion] Rename "Local" to "This PC"
  • #110 [Suggestion] Change the way the application starts up
  • #109 Fill out support for alernate package sources
  • #106 Add a way to show all updates or maybe sort by last updated
  • #101 Navigate back to Local Source List after uninstalling or updating a package.
  • #96 Implement Package Service
  • #94 Add Package View Page
  • #92 Chocolatey GUI should show license information for packages
  • #91 Update Readme with information about contributing
  • #90 Update Wix package to include output from WPF Project
  • #81 Update information in Help | About Page
  • #40 .Net Framework 4.0 Dependency
  • #32 chocolatey allows you to do a force update
  • #9 Add better search via the odata feed
  • #8 Add paging to the available packages list

Improvements

  • #200 Correct Line Endings Configuration for repository
  • #199 Add a title in the taskbar
  • #196 Fix AppVeyor Build
  • #195 Add AppVeyor notifications
  • #191 Checkbox replaced with tick/cross chars
  • #180 Adding Build Caching in AppVeyor
  • #172 Update the Build and Testing Process
  • #168 Fix Code Analysis Issues
  • #160 Setup ReSharper Duplicate Checker
  • #159 Setup ReSharper Code Inspections
  • #158 Setup Code Analysis
  • #157 Setup StyleCop
  • #152 Add Deployment Task to Chocolatey
  • #151 Add Deployment Task to MyGet
  • #149 Inspect AppVeyor Environment Variables to decide what action should be taken
  • #148 Add Solution Folders for BuildScripts and appveyor.yml file
  • #146 Only run GitVersion UpdateAssemblyInfo if on AppVeyor
  • #144 Setup Build Caching in AppVeyor to speed up build
  • #142 Add appveyor.yml to control build process
  • #140 Add GitVersion to source code and execute from psake
  • #135 Update MahApps.Metro version.
  • #98 Implement Logging
  • #89 Create MyGet Build Service for the wpf-refresh branch

Bugs

  • #204 Unable to add source
  • #201 Uninstall script doesn't wait for the uninstaller to finish
  • #198 Installation broken in latest release
  • #193 Not all installed packages get listed
  • #174 Fix Broken Markdown.cs
  • #127 Potential issue with "INSTALLED" checkbox
  • #126 Unable to run latest Chocolatey GUI package from MyGet
  • #123 When not running Chocolatey GUI, each package update present UAC prompt
  • #120 Index was outside the bounds of the array
  • #117 [BUG] Packages appear twice in Local Tab
  • #116 [BUG] Delete button can't always be seen
  • #105 Details Page: Items not quite lined up
  • #104 Problem with searching when on second page of results
  • #100 Remove packages from Local package list when they're uninstalled
  • #97 Fix cuninst of Chocolatey GUI
  • #85 Unable to get packages and package information from behind proxy.
  • #70 Problem adding new package source
  • #67 Unhandled Exception

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added to here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.

item.title: Chocolatey GUI 0.11.1
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
This release includes the following:

Features

  • #53 add tab with releasenotes and Copyrightinformation
  • #52 Add clear cache button to settings
  • #29 Improved parsing for dependency strings
  • #3 There's no uninstall script in the 0.0.5 package

Improvements

  • #54 Make the statusbar a usercontrol
  • #44 split up packagesservice
  • #41 Prevent old packages being to MyGet Feed
  • #24 getting wix, app and choco version in line.
  • #10 Better logging
  • #4 UI- and performance improvements

Bugs

  • #60 Settings Window - Pressing Esc should close this window
  • #59 About Window - Pressing Esc should close this window
  • #58 Help Window - Pressing Esc should close this window
  • #57 Clipping of installed packages number
  • #56 Small amount of clipping on Copyright Information Tab
  • #42 Improve filename to package name parsing
  • #36 ChocolateyLibDirHelper.VersionChangeFinished Index OOR Exception
  • #34 Error in detection of highest installed package version

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added to here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.

Bugs

  • #39 installed packages problem with -pre packages
  • #35 icons on the tabs are gone.
  • #30 WMF 3
  • #28 severe truncation in tags and dependencies panes
  • #25 Fix failing Unit Tests

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added to here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.

item.title: Chocolatey GUI 0.1.0
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
This release includes the following:

Improvements

  • More information about a package
  • Shows chocolatey as an installed package.
  • Performance improvement
  • You can search in the list. It is a StartsWith search.
  • You can install the available package by clicking on the checkbox.
  • You can uninstall a package.

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added to here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.

item.title: Chocolatey GUI 0.0.5
item.description: We are very happy to announce the initial release of the Chocolatey GUI project.
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
We are very happy to announce the initial release of the Chocolatey GUI project.

NOTE: This blog post was created after the actual release occured, and is added to here in order to preserve the history of the Chocolatey GUI project.
